links.title: Netflix is the latest company to try bypassing Apple's app store
links.description: Netflix is joining the likes of Epic Games Inc. and Spotify Technology SA in its latest move: testing a way for users to register and pay for the streaming service while bypassing Apple Inc.'s app store and hefty commission fees. The streaming giant is the latest company to look into bypassing Apple's app store and Alphabet Inc.'s Google Play.

links.title: Apple is hiring scores of ex-Tesla employees, and not just for its car project
links.description: Yuriko Nakao | Bloomberg | Getty Images Apple has attracted scores of employees away from Tesla since late 2017, including manufacturing, security and software engineers, and, more recently, supply chain experts, according to several current and former Tesla employees and LinkedIn data. This Tesla talent is not only going to Apple's stealthy vehicle initiative, Project Titan.
